content.rendered:
Directed by Prakash Raj.

Written by Joy Mathew.

Cast Prakash Raj(Bhujangaiah). Priyamani(Susheela). Achyuth Kumar(Garuda). Rangayana Raghu(Circle Inspector). Raghu Babu(Circle Inspector). Prudhviraj(Garuda). Satyadev Kancharana(Shiva) . Lokesh Achar(Head Constable). Radha Ammatti(Procession Incharge). Guru Arya(Bus Passenger). Sudha Belawadi(Bhanu). Teju Belawadi(Parinitha). Cheluva(Laxman). Doddanna(Producer). Ramana Gopisetti(Film Director). Shivajirao Jadhav(Tailor). Aravind Kuplikar(Shiva). Bhargavi Narayan(Grand Mother). Ningaraju(Ram). Ramesh Pandith(Broker). Prashanth(Hotel Receptionist). Prathibha(Model). Punith(Painter). Hitha Raag(Siri). Ragavendra(Pujari). Raghavendra(Assistant Director). Gautham Raju(Sub Inspector). Ramesh(Drunkard). Samanvith(Constable). Nagendra Shah(Kamath). Prashanth Shenoy(Venkatesh). Murali Shrungeri(Drama Master). K. Srinivas(Shiva’s Friend). Surya(Film Producer). Narayan Swamy(Surendra). Tilak(Hanuman). Varun(Parinitha’s Friend). Vijay(Bhanu’s Brother)

Language Kannada.

Producers Ramjee Narasiman. Prakash Raj.

Production 1st Copy Pictures. Prakash Raj Productions.
